name: SpeechGen.io
description: SpeechGen.io is an AI-powered text-to-speech platform that generates realistic voiceovers for various applications.
longDescription: SpeechGen.io is an advanced, AI-driven text-to-speech converter designed to transform written text into natural-sounding audio for diverse use cases. It serves content creators, educators, marketers, and developers by providing over 270 realistic voices in 76+ languages, enabling professional-grade voiceovers without costly studio production. The platform supports a wide range of applications, from video content and e-learning to podcasts and public announcements, making audio creation accessible and efficient. Its user-friendly interface and customizable voice settings cater to both beginners and professionals, ensuring high-quality, human-like audio output. SpeechGen.io also prioritizes affordability, with pricing starting at $0.08 per 1000 characters, and offers robust customer support for a seamless user experience.
features: Converts text to realistic speech in MP3, WAV, or OGG formats for versatile use across platforms like YouTube and podcasts.
Offers over 270 natural-sounding AI voices across 76+ languages to cater to global audiences.
Provides customizable voice settings, including pitch, speed, and pronunciation, for tailored audio output.
Supports long texts up to 2 million characters per conversion, ideal for audiobooks and lengthy content.
Includes a multi-voice editor to create dynamic dialogues with multiple AI voices in a single project.
Features SSML support to fine-tune pronunciation, emphasis, and pauses for professional audio results.
Enables commercial use of generated audio, suitable for advertisements, social media, and video content.
Offers a cloud-based system for storing and sharing audio files, enhancing workflow collaboration.
Provides API integration for developers to embed text-to-speech functionality into applications.

faqs.question: What is SpeechGen.io used for?
faqs.answer: SpeechGen.io converts text into realistic speech for applications like video voiceovers, podcasts, e-learning, and public announcements.

faqs.question: Does SpeechGen.io offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, SpeechGen.io offers a free plan with limited usage, allowing users to test its features before subscribing.

faqs.question: What audio formats are supported by SpeechGen.io?
faqs.answer: SpeechGen.io supports MP3, WAV, and OGG formats for downloading generated audio files.

faqs.question: Can I use SpeechGen.io audio for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, SpeechGen.io allows commercial use of its audio for videos, ads, and other professional projects.

faqs.question: How many languages does SpeechGen.io support?
faqs.answer: SpeechGen.io supports over 76 languages with a variety of accents and voice options.

faqs.question: Is there an API available for developers?
faqs.answer: Yes, SpeechGen.io provides an API for integrating its text-to-speech technology into applications or websites.

faqs.question: Can I customize the voice output?
faqs.answer: SpeechGen.io allows customization of pitch, speed, volume, and pronunciation to suit specific needs.

faqs.question: What is the character limit for text conversion?
faqs.answer: SpeechGen.io supports up to 2 million characters per text-to-speech conversion.
